entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI webapi call fails FATAL #21893
  • Erratic Behavior in Button's on Text Change #21890
  • Multiple bugs in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.IImage platform specific implementations #21886
  • Indexers on basemodels not recognized in XAML when used on properties of derived class #21878
  • `TargetName` attribute in `<Setter>`s does not work with custom controls #21877
  • Flyout open close with some lagging #21876
  • Named pipes on MacOS can't connect in .NET 8 #21874
  • Ability to detect whether we are connected via a VPN on iOS #21873
  • WebAuthenticator iOS/MacCatalyst uses Default Web Browser (rejected by App Store reviewer) #21872
  • MAUI CollectionView filter with SearchBar text input lagging on ios #21871

Closed

  • XamlC Compilation errors when upgrading to Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.20 #21757
    .NET 8 SR4
  • BlazorWebView: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirectory #21750
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI app crashes on Android in debug mode and has errors in release mode #21525
  • In Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 3 Project Properties do not open anymore #21758
  • Running app one day without touching it craching after move to other page #21576
  • Cannot put spaces in project names - Maui then attempts to use underscores in App manifest name which are not allowed - causes failure to build #21172
  • MAUI Windows application not navigating when app not in focus. #21158
    Backlog
  • CollectionView crash on scroll: 'The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first.' #21565

PullRequests

Created

  • Update locker.yml #21894
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [tests] add `SourceGen.UnitTests` to CI #21889
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in gestures #21887
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • Remove excess check #21883
  • [C] Propagate resources when reparenting #21879

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #21882
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute and enable analyzers in Controls.Core.csproj #21621

Updated

  • WIP: Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage, community ✨, potential-regression
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
